title: POPPER VS ADORNO 2 Positivism and Pluralism
itunes:author: Toby Buckle
itunes:summary: What is ‘Positivism’ and why was it so important so Adorno to label Popper as one? Popper’s response, and what can we learn from this failure to communicate?
itunes:subtitle: What is ‘Positivism’ and why was it so important …
description: What is ‘Positivism’ and why was it so important so Adorno to label Popper as one? Popper’s response, and what can we learn from this failure to communicate?
